name: Vegan Scallops with Angel Hair Pasta
description: The vegan scallops in this recipe are made from hearts of palm and pan fried in vegan butter. So tender and meaty, theyâ€™re the perfect topping for the lemon, garlic, and white wine-dressed pasta.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup dry white wine (or vegetable broth)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the hearts of palm into 1/2 inch thick rounds (these are your vegan scallops.)
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the hearts of palm into 1/2 inch thick rounds (these are your vegan scallops.)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan (non stick or cast iron preferred), add 2 tablespoons of vegan butter over medium-high heat. Once sizzling, add the hearts of palm in a single layer without overcrowding the pan. If needed, do a couple of batches.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan (non stick or cast iron preferred), add 2 tablespoons of vegan butter over medium-high heat. Once sizzling, add the hearts of palm in a single layer without overcrowding the pan. If needed, do a couple of batches.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with a little salt + pepper, and fry for 2-3 minutes on each side until a golden crust forms underneath.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with a little salt + pepper, and fry for 2-3 minutes on each side until a golden crust forms underneath.

recipeInstructions.text: Flip them and fry again for 2-3 minutes until golden brown on both sides. Remove from the skillet and transfer to a plate nearby.
recipeInstructions.name: Flip them and fry again for 2-3 minutes until golden brown on both sides. Remove from the skillet and transfer to a plate nearby.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same skillet, melt 4 tablespoons of vegan butter. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Pour in the wine (or broth) and bring to a simmer for about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same skillet, melt 4 tablespoons of vegan butter. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Pour in the wine (or broth) and bring to a simmer for about 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Now stir in the lemon juice and add salt + pepper, to taste. Turn off the heat and add the vegan scallops to the sauce. Garnish with fresh chopped parsley.
recipeInstructions.name: Now stir in the lemon juice and add salt + pepper, to taste. Turn off the heat and add the vegan scallops to the sauce. Garnish with fresh chopped parsley.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve over cooked angel hair pasta, with enough sauce to coat the noodles. Enjoy!
